statements.sql: select `categories`.*, (select count(*) from `posts` inner join `post_categories` on `posts`.`id` = `post_categories`.`post_id` where `categories`.`id` = `post_categories`.`category_id` and `posts`.`deleted_at` is null) as `posts_count` from `categories`
